title: Just me?
body: Before pre season started the game for me always had this smooth run to it, it flowed so naturally but ever since the patch came out I cant help but feel like the game is sooo gluggy or laggyish and im not really sure why. Anyone else feel the same way?

replies.body: I have had the opposite. My games are running smoother...{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

> [{quoted}](name=MrPine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hOgZABZl,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-12-04T18:55:27.864+0000)
>
> Before pre season started the game for me always had this smooth run to it, it flowed so naturally but ever since the patch came out I cant help but feel like the game is sooo gluggy or laggyish ?

I have the same problem.. FPS drops and a constant ping of 18ms but then suddenly a monumental lagg  i have no idea why.

RIOT HELP US PLSS?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
